title: Iran Turns to Digital Surveillance Tools to Track Down Protesters
summary_full: As Iranian authorities restore some online services after crushing antigovernment demonstrations, they are using a technological dragnet to target attendees of the protests.
summary_public: As Iranian authorities restore some online services after crushing antigovernment demonstrations, they are using a technological dragnet to target attendees of the protests.

IR.label: negative
